verses.verse: אֵיכָה֩ <S%H349><s%> how יָעִ֨יב <S%H5743><s%> with a cloud בְּאַפּ֤וֹ ׀ <S%H639><s%> in his anger אֲדֹנָי֙ <S%H136><s%> How hath the Lord אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הִשְׁלִ֤יךְ <S%H7993><s%> [and] cast down מִשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the earth תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> the beauty יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זָכַ֥ר <S%H2142><s%> and remembered הֲדֹם־ <S%H1916><s%> stool רַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> be able to endure בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day אַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H639><s%> of his anger ס

בִּלַּ֨ע <S%H1104><s%> hath swallowed up אֲדֹנָ֜י <S%H136><s%> The Lord [לֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not ק) חָמַ֗ל <S%H2550><s%> and hath not pitied אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> all the habitations יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob הָרַ֧ס <S%H2040><s%> he hath thrown down בְּעֶבְרָת֛וֹ <S%H5678><s%> in his wrath מִבְצְרֵ֥י <S%H4013><s%> the strong holds בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הִגִּ֣יעַ <S%H5060><s%> he hath brought [them] down לָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground חִלֵּ֥ל <S%H2490><s%> he hath polluted מַמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom וְשָׂרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H8269><s%> and the princes ס

גָּדַ֣ע <S%H1438><s%> He hath cut off בָּֽחֳרִי־ <S%H2750><s%> in [his] fierce אַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> anger כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All קֶ֣רֶן <S%H7161><s%> all the horn יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> he hath drawn אָח֛וֹר <S%H268><s%> back יְמִינ֖וֹ <S%H3225><s%> his right hand מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> from before אוֹיֵ֑ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy וַיִּבְעַ֤ר <S%H1197><s%> and he burned בְּיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> against Jacob כְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire לֶֽהָבָ֔ה <S%H3852><s%> like a flaming אָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> [which] devoureth סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about ס

דָּרַ֨ךְ <S%H1869><s%> He hath bent קַשְׁתּ֜וֹ <S%H7198><s%> his bow כְּאוֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> like an enemy נִצָּ֤ב <S%H5324><s%> he stood יְמִינוֹ֙ <S%H3225><s%> with his right hand כְּצָ֔ר <S%H6862><s%> as an adversary וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> and slew כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲמַדֵּי־ <S%H4261><s%> all [that were] pleasant עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> to the eye בְּאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion שָׁפַ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> he poured out כָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> like fire חֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2534><s%> his fury ס

הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> has become אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <S%H136><s%> The Lord כְּאוֹיֵב֙ <S%H341><s%> was as an enemy בִּלַּ֣ע <S%H1104><s%> he hath swallowed up יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel בִּלַּע֙ <S%H1104><s%> he hath swallowed up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H759><s%> all her palaces שִׁחֵ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> he hath destroyed מִבְצָרָ֑יו <S%H4013><s%> his strong holds וַיֶּ֙רֶב֙ <S%H7235><s%> and hath increased בְּבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> in the daughter יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah תַּאֲנִיָּ֖ה <S%H8386><s%> mourning וַאֲנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H592><s%> and lamentation ס

וַיַּחְמֹ֤ס <S%H2554><s%> And he hath violently taken away כַּגַּן֙ <S%H1588><s%> as [if it were of] a garden שֻׂכּ֔וֹ <S%H7900><s%> his tabernacle שִׁחֵ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> he hath destroyed מוֹעֲד֑וֹ <S%H4150><s%> his places of the assembly שִׁכַּ֨ח <S%H7911><s%> to be forgotten יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּצִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> in Zion מוֹעֵ֣ד <S%H4150><s%> hath caused the solemn feasts וְשַׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> and sabbaths וַיִּנְאַ֥ץ <S%H5006><s%> and hath despised בְּזַֽעַם־ <S%H2195><s%> in the indignation אַפּ֖וֹ <S%H639><s%> of his anger מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְכֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> and the priest ס

זָנַ֨ח <S%H2186><s%> hath cast off אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <S%H136><s%> The Lord מִזְבְּחוֹ֙ <S%H4196><s%> his altar נִאֵ֣ר <S%H5010><s%> he hath abhorred מִקְדָּשׁ֔וֹ <S%H4720><s%> his sanctuary הִסְגִּיר֙ <S%H5462><s%> he hath given up בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אוֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy חוֹמֹ֖ת <S%H2346><s%> the walls אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H759><s%> of her palaces ק֛וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a noise נָתְנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> they have made בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as in the day מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of a solemn feast ס

חָשַׁ֨ב <S%H2803><s%> hath purposed יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לְהַשְׁחִית֙ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> the wall בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion נָ֣טָה <S%H5186><s%> he hath stretched out קָ֔ו <S%H6957><s%> a line לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not הֵשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> he hath not withdrawn יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מִבַּלֵּ֑עַ <S%H1104><s%> from destroying וַיַּֽאֲבֶל־ <S%H56><s%> to lament חֵ֥ל <S%H2426><s%> therefore he made the rampart וְחוֹמָ֖ה <S%H2346><s%> and the wall יַחְדָּ֥ו <S%H3162><s%> together אֻמְלָֽלוּ׃ <S%H535><s%> they languished ס

טָבְע֤וּ <S%H2883><s%> are sunk בָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> into the ground שְׁעָרֶ֔יהָ <S%H8179><s%> Her gates אִבַּ֥ד <S%H6><s%> he hath destroyed וְשִׁבַּ֖ר <S%H7665><s%> and broken בְּרִיחֶ֑יהָ <S%H1280><s%> her bars מַלְכָּ֨הּ <S%H4428><s%> her king וְשָׂרֶ֤יהָ <S%H8269><s%> and her princes בַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> [are] among the Gentiles אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no תּוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> the law גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Also נְבִיאֶ֕יהָ <S%H5030><s%> [is] no [more] her prophets לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No מָצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> also find חָז֖וֹן <S%H2377><s%> no vision מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD ס

יֵשְׁב֨וּ <S%H3427><s%> sit לָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon the ground יִדְּמוּ֙ <S%H1826><s%> [and] keep silence זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> The elders בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion הֶֽעֱל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> they have cast up עָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> dust עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> upon their heads חָגְר֖וּ <S%H2296><s%> they have girded שַׂקִּ֑ים <S%H8242><s%> themselves with sackcloth הוֹרִ֤ידוּ <S%H3381><s%> hang down לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> to the ground רֹאשָׁ֔ן <S%H7218><s%> their heads בְּתוּלֹ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> the virgins יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem ס

כָּל֨וּ <S%H3615><s%> do fail בַדְּמָע֤וֹת <S%H1832><s%> with tears עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> Mine eyes חֳמַרְמְר֣וּ <S%H2560><s%> are troubled מֵעַ֔י <S%H4578><s%> my bowels נִשְׁפַּ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> is poured לָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> upon the earth כְּבֵדִ֔י <S%H3516><s%> my liver עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because שֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> for the destruction בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> of my people בֵּֽעָטֵ֤ף <S%H5848><s%> swoon עוֹלֵל֙ <S%H5768><s%> because the children וְיוֹנֵ֔ק <S%H3243><s%> and the sucklings בִּרְחֹב֖וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the streets קִרְיָֽה׃ <S%H7151><s%> of the city ס

לְאִמֹּתָם֙ <S%H517><s%> to their mothers יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> They say אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> Where דָּגָ֣ן <S%H1715><s%> Where [is] corn וָיָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> banqueting בְּהִֽתְעַטְּפָ֤ם <S%H5848><s%> cover כֶּֽחָלָל֙ <S%H2491><s%> as the wounded בִּרְחֹב֣וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the streets עִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city בְּהִשְׁתַּפֵּ֣ךְ <S%H8210><s%> was poured out נַפְשָׁ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> when their soul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about חֵ֖יק <S%H2436><s%> bosom אִמֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H517><s%> into their mothers' ס

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> for thee? what thing אֲעִידֵ֞ךְ <S%H5749><s%> admonish מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> to what אֲדַמֶּה־ <S%H1819><s%> shall I liken לָּ֗ךְ הַבַּת֙ <S%H1323><s%> to thee O daughter יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> to what אַשְׁוֶה־ <S%H7737><s%> liken לָּךְ֙ וַאֲנַֽחֲמֵ֔ךְ <S%H5162><s%> to thee that I may comfort בְּתוּלַ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> thee O virgin בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is as גָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great כַּיָּ֛ם <S%H3220><s%> like the sea שִׁבְרֵ֖ךְ <S%H7667><s%> affliction מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who יִרְפָּא־ <S%H7495><s%> who can heal לָֽךְ׃ ס

נְבִיאַ֗יִךְ <S%H5030><s%> Thy prophets חָ֤זוּ <S%H2372><s%> have seen לָךְ֙ שָׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> vain וְתָפֵ֔ל <S%H8602><s%> and foolish things וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not גִלּ֥וּ <S%H1540><s%> for thee and they have not discovered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עֲוֹנֵ֖ךְ <S%H5771><s%> thine iniquity לְהָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> to turn away [שְׁבִיתֵךְ כ] (שְׁבוּתֵ֑ךְ <S%H7622><s%> captive ק) וַיֶּ֣חֱזוּ <S%H2372><s%> but have seen לָ֔ךְ מַשְׂא֥וֹת <S%H4864><s%> burdens שָׁ֖וְא <S%H7723><s%> for thee false וּמַדּוּחִֽים׃ <S%H4065><s%> and causes of banishment ס

סָֽפְק֨וּ <S%H5606><s%> by clap עָלַ֤יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and כַּפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H3709><s%> [their] hands כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֹ֣בְרֵי <S%H5674><s%> All that pass דֶ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> at thee שָֽׁרְקוּ֙ <S%H8319><s%> they hiss וַיָּנִ֣עוּ <S%H5128><s%> and wag רֹאשָׁ֔ם <S%H7218><s%> their head עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> At בַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> at the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem הֲזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> [saying Is] this the city שֶׁיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> that [men] call כְּלִ֣ילַת <S%H3632><s%> The perfection יֹ֔פִי <S%H3308><s%> of beauty מָשׂ֖וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> The joy לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> common ס

פָּצ֨וּ <S%H6475><s%> have opened עָלַ֤יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against פִּיהֶם֙ <S%H6310><s%> their mouth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All א֣וֹיְבַ֔יִךְ <S%H341><s%> All thine enemies שָֽׁרְקוּ֙ <S%H8319><s%> against thee they hiss וַיַּֽחַרְקוּ־ <S%H2786><s%> and gnash שֵׁ֔ן <S%H8127><s%> the teeth אָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> they say בִּלָּ֑עְנוּ <S%H1104><s%> We have swallowed [her] up אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> certainly זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> this הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this [is] the day שֶׁקִּוִּינֻ֖הוּ <S%H6960><s%> that we looked for מָצָ֥אנוּ <S%H4672><s%> we have found רָאִֽינוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> we have seen ס

עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> hath done יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what זָמָ֗ם <S%H2161><s%> [that] which he had devised בִּצַּ֤ע <S%H1214><s%> he hath fulfilled אֶמְרָתוֹ֙ <S%H565><s%> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> that he had commanded מִֽימֵי־ <S%H3117><s%> in the days קֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of old הָרַ֖ס <S%H2040><s%> he hath thrown down וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without חָמָ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> and hath not pitied וַיְשַׂמַּ֤ח <S%H8055><s%> to rejoice עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> over אוֹיֵ֔ב <S%H341><s%> and he hath caused [thine] enemy הֵרִ֖ים <S%H7311><s%> over thee he hath set up קֶ֥רֶן <S%H7161><s%> the horn צָרָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H6862><s%> of thine adversaries ס
